{{codepointer|Sound}}'''A_ActiveSound'''
(no parameters)
==Usage== Plays the actor's {{Property|ActiveSound|active sound}} on the ''voice'' [[Sound channels|channel]].
== Examples ==
Strife's {{Class|Merchant}} actors use this special to periodically play their greeting sounds:
Spawn: MRST A 10 [[A_Look2]] Loop MRLK A 30 '''A_ActiveSound''' Loop MRLK B 30 Loop MRBD ABCDEDCB 4 MRBD A 5 MRBD F 6 Loop
